info.name: Node.js Project Documentation
info.description:
Welcome to the Product API Documentation. This API allows you to interact with a dataset of products, enabling you to retrieve, filter, and sort product data. The following endpoints are available:

- **Get All Products**: Retrieve the complete list of products.
    
- **Get All Products Sorted by Name**: Retrieve the list of products sorted by their name in ascending order.
    
- **Get All Products Sorted by Version**: Retrieve the list of products sorted by their version in ascending order.
    
- **Get All Products Sorted by Language**: Retrieve the list of products sorted by their language in ascending order.
    
- **Filter Products by Language**: Retrieve the list of products filtered by a specified language.
    

Each endpoint description includes the HTTP method, URL, parameters, and example responses. Follow the instructions to utilize the API effectively.

request.description: This endpoint retrieves a list of all products. Each product contains detailed information such as name, language, ID, bio, and version. The response is a JSON array of product objects.

item.name: Get all Products sorted by name

request.description: This endpoint retrieves a list of all products sorted by their name in ascending order. The response is a JSON array of product objects sorted by name.

item.name: Get All Products Sorted by Language

request.description: This endpoint retrieves a list of all products sorted by their language in ascending order. The response is a JSON array of product objects sorted by language.
This endpoint retrieves a list of products filtered by a specified language. The response is a JSON array of product objects that match the specified language.
This endpoint retrieves a list of all products sorted by their version in ascending order. The response is a JSON array of product objects sorted by version.
